typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SustainmentAction as string,
		EquipmentGroup as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadCreateSustainmentActionsEquipmentGroups
ReadCreateSustainmentActionsEquipmentGroups select(mapColumn(
		{$sourceId} = SustainmentAction,
		{$targetId} = EquipmentGroup),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> IdSelection
IdSelection derive({$relationshipName} = 'is_on_EquipmentGroup',
	{$relationshipDelete} = 'false',
	{$relationshipId} = {$sourceId} + 'to' + {$targetId}) ~> ModelDefinition
ModelDefinition sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['tmp_SustainmentActionsEquipmentGroups.v1.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteToTempRepo
source(output(
		SustainmentAction as string,
		EquipmentGroup as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadTempStatusSustainmentActionsEquipmentGroupsStatusEditor
ReadCreateSustainmentActionsEquipmentGroups select(mapColumn(
		SustainmentAction,
		EquipmentGroup),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> StatusColumnSelectionSustainmentActionsEquipmentGroupsStatusEditor
ReadTempStatusSustainmentActionsEquipmentGroupsStatusEditor, StatusColumnSelectionSustainmentActionsEquipmentGroupsStatusEditor union(byName: true)~> StatusUpdateSustainmentActionsEquipmentGroupsStatusEditor
StatusUpdateSustainmentActionsEquipmentGroupsStatusEditor sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['SustainmentActionsEquipmentGroups_status.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteTempStatusStatusUpdateSustainmentActionsEquipmentGroupsStatusEditor
